Class.name: EasyCSP.Validator.Validators.Alpha
Class.Description:
Pass in an EasyCSP.Model.attribute instance. A copy of the instance will be passed back. a list then every element in it must pass the test. If even one element does not then the return will be FALSE (0). TRUE is returned for each element if that element consists only of the characters [A-Z,a-z]

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
attribute = @ME->init(parameters) if attribute->hasErrors() then return attribute
inputValue = attribute->value
if $data(inputValue) = 0 then return attribute ; * presence is handled by the Required validator if $get(inputValue) = "" then return attribute ; * ibid
numberOfValuesToTest = dCount(inputValue, @am) ; * check each value
for idx = 1 to numberOfValuesToTest if (inputValue<idx> <> oConv(inputValue<idx>,"MCA")) then attribute->adderror("Value '" : value : "' must be alphabetic only.") end Next
return attribute
